languages.text: Сверкание золота померкло, сочленения покрыты копотью, стальные пальцы исцарапаны и все в сколах, словно они скребли по металлу или скалобетону.
The gleam of gold has faded, the joints are covered in soot, the steel fingers are scratched and chipped as if they have been scraped repeatedly against metal or rockcrete.
languages.original_text: Сверкание золота померкло, сочленения покрыты копотью, стальные пальцы исцарапаны и все в сколах, словно они скребли по металлу или скалобетону.

traits.locale_text: The gleam of gold has faded, the joints are covered in soot, the steel fingers are scratched and all chipped as if they had been scraping againt metal or rockcrete.
The gleam of gold has faded, the joints are covered in soot, the steel fingers are scratched and all chipped as if they had been scraping againt metal or rockcrete.
The gleam of gold has faded, the joints are covered in soot, the steel fingers are scratched and chipped as if they have been scraped repeatedly against metal or rockcrete.
The gleam of gold has faded, the joints are covered in soot, the steel fingers are scratched and chipped as if they have been scraped repeatedly against metal or rockcrete.
The gleam of gold has faded, the joints are covered in soot, the steel fingers are scratched and chipped as if they have been scraped repeatedly against metal or rockcrete.

languages.text: 义体上的金色已经褪了色，关节的连接处布满了灰烬。钢质手指上也布满了磨损的痕迹，看起来像是在金属或岩凝土上被反复摩擦过。
languages.original_text: The gleam of gold has faded, the joints are covered in soot, the steel fingers are scratched and chipped as if they have been scraped repeatedly against metal or rockcrete.

traits.locale_text: 义体上的金色已经褪了色，关节的连接处布满了灰烬。钢质手指上也布满了磨损的痕迹，看起来像是在金属或岩凝土上被反复摩擦过。

languages.text: 金の輝きが消え、ジョイントは煤に覆われ、鋼の指はまるで金属かロッククレートに繰り返し擦り付けられたかのように擦り切れ砕かれていた。
languages.original_text: The gleam of gold has faded, the joints are covered in soot, the steel fingers are scratched and chipped as if they have been scraped repeatedly against metal or rockcrete.

traits.locale_text: 金の輝きが消え、ジョイントは煤に覆われ、鋼の指はまるで金属かロッククレートに繰り返し擦り付けられたかのように擦り切れ砕かれていた。

languages.text: L'éclat de l'or s'est estompé, les articulations sont couvertes de suie, les doigts en acier sont éraflés et ébréchés comme s'ils avaient été frottés de manière répétée contre du métal ou du rocbéton.
languages.original_text: The gleam of gold has faded, the joints are covered in soot, the steel fingers are scratched and chipped as if they have been scraped repeatedly against metal or rockcrete.

traits.locale_text: L'éclat de l'or s'est estompé, les articulations sont couvertes de suie, les doigts en acier sont éraflés et ébréchés comme s'ils avaient été frottés de manière répétée contre du métal ou du rocbéton.

languages.text: Ha perdido su brillo dorado, sus juntas están llenas de hollín y los dedos de acero están arañados y astillados como si alguien los hubiese rozado contra metal o rococemento.
languages.original_text: The gleam of gold has faded, the joints are covered in soot, the steel fingers are scratched and chipped as if they have been scraped repeatedly against metal or rockcrete.

traits.locale_text: Ha perdido su brillo dorado, sus juntas están llenas de hollín y los dedos de acero están arañados y astillados como si alguien los hubiese rozado contra metal o rococemento.

languages.text: Der Goldglanz ist verblasst, die Gelenke sind voller Ruß, und die Stahlfinger sind verkratzt und beschädigt, als wären sie wiederholt gegen Metall oder Felsbeton geschlagen worden.
languages.original_text: The gleam of gold has faded, the joints are covered in soot, the steel fingers are scratched and chipped as if they have been scraped repeatedly against metal or rockcrete.

traits.locale_text: Der Goldglanz ist verblasst, die Gelenke sind voller Ruß, und die Stahlfinger sind verkratzt und beschädigt, als wären sie wiederholt gegen Metall oder Felsbeton geschlagen worden.
